title: Tafseer As-Showi Surah Al-Baqarah Ayat 19-24
description: In this chapter we learn about type of people that were told to not commit Fasaad (by kufr and preventing people for being believer) but were thinking doing the right thing while they were not

title: Tafseer As-Showi Surah Al-Baqarah Ayat 11
description: In this chapter we learn about type of people that were told to not commit Fasaad (by kufr and preventing people for being believer) but were thinking doing the right thing while they were not

title: Tafseer As-Showi Surah Al-Baqarah Ayat 1
description: We learn what are the signs of Muttaqiin that Allah Will Guide through the Holy Quran and we elaborate more on the topic of hidayah and some causes that prevent hidayah enters into heart

title: Tafseer As-Showi Surat Al-Qadr
description: Tafseer As-Showi Surah Al-Qadr, on the event of the descendant of the Qur'an we discuss one important chapter of the Qur'an
